Quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
I hated every minute of training, but I said "Don't Quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion."
It ain't over till its over.
Your never a loser till you quit trying.
Let us never negotiate out of fear. But let us never fear to negotiate.
There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder.
Life is a movie, pick your own role, climb your own ladder or you dig your own hole.
We all get distracted, the question is, would you bounce back or bounce backwards?
During your life, never stop dreaming. No one can take away your dreams.
A great man is hard on himself; a small man is hard on others.
Carpe diem! (seize the day)
Knowing how to think empowers you far beyond those who know only what to think.
Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
It's not about the number of hours you practice, it's about the number of hours your mind is present during the practice.
Even a broke clock is right twice a day.
It's not about what you're capable of, it's about what you're willing to do.
I've never really been aware of what is said about me, whether it's positive or negative. I ignore it. I've always had the mindset: "No one can challenge me better than myself."
The hardest thing to do is work hard when no one is watching.
If your dream ain't bigger than you, there's a problem with your dream.
Don't run too fast through life. You only have one.
The day you stop doing the small things is the day you think you're above everybody else.
Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn
You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life
It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward
Patriotism means to stand by the country. It does not mean to stand by the president.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
A man should never neglect his family for business.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
I only regret that I have but one life to lose for my country.
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Luck is predictable; the harder your work, the luckier you get.
I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
If you can't make it good, at least make it look good.
Winning takes talent; to repeat takes character.
You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.
If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
Cancer can take away all of my physical abilities. It cannot touch my mind, it cannot touch my heart, and it cannot touch my soul.
Never mistake motion for action
Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom
You can close your eyes to the things you don't want to see, but you can't close your heart to the things you don't want to feel.
If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
Never dull your shine for somebody else.
What we think or what we know or what we believe is in the end of little consequence. The only thing of consequence is what we do.
Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
Talent is cheaper than table salt. What seperates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
I do not think much of a man who is not wiser today than he was yesterday.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
When you are offended at any man's fault, turn to yourself and study your own failings. Then you will forget your anger.
If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn't thinking.
You can't seperate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
Patience is the companion of wisdom.
The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
Never say never, becuase limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
Leadership is something you earn, something you're chosen for. You can't come in yelling, "I'm your leader!" If it happens, it's becuase the other guys respect you.
Dreams are so important. You need to have big goals and expect a lot of yourself but you have to enjoy the ride too.
Don't be afraid of faliure. This is the way to succeed.
Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.
Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do
Beginners are many; finishers are few.
Don't count the days, make the days count.
You cannot wait for someone to save you, to help you, to complete you. No one can complete you. You complete yourself.
Dont let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game
It is Called Garbage Can, Not Garbage Cannot
